name: Action Game Clone - Intro to Game Dev Project 2_1
name_original: Action Game Clone - Intro to Game Dev Project 2_1
description:
This is Project 2 part 1 of 2022 Fall NYU Intro to Game Dev class, the clone of Action Game.

In the game, players manipulate two characters to jump among the clouds, avoiding falling and stepping on each other to get a higher score.

Controls: WASD for player 1, arrow keys for player 2.

  • Sound effects - intercepted from the original game
  • Score font - Kenney Mini Square (followed by the CC0 1.0 Universal)
  • Images - drawn by my ownself
